We help companies design life changing apps and software

Olive

Olive connects technology buyers with the right solutions and technology vendors with their target customers. In other words, Olive is out to kill steak dinner handshake deals and biased RFPs. We helped Olive bring both sides together into one easy to use app.

See Project
“Working with Sixzero has been a game changer. Not only did they make our app look great, their obsession with getting to know and understand our customers helped us build Olive into something truly valuable.”
Chris Heard
CEO, Olive App

Thinkific

Thinkific is a platform that allows anyone create, market, sell, and deliver their own online courses. It’s used by thousands of people daily to learn and spread knowledge, changing lives in the process.

See Project
